data.title: Creative food with flair
data.text: Loved the variety of top notch food!  It was creative and delicious!  They are not afraid of spice here and they deliver it in a vast array of different choices and cuisines!  Everything that was served at our table was perfection from the mussels to the Thai basil.  The tuna with wasabi was perfectly cooked and the green curry was outstanding.  They also serve hamburgers, steaks, etc.. something for everyone!!

data.title: Great place to get a bite to eat!
data.text: The appetizers are a meal in themselves! They have wonderful pizza, you add your own toppings! My friendsa nd I will go here to grab a bite to eat and drink before heading to a concert!

data.title: A GREAT find in downtown St Cloud
data.text: An unexpected large quality menu with fresh fish, meat and pasta. Wonderfully prepared and served by friendly wait staff. Casual and on Friday night a little noisey.

data.title: With wife parents and sister.
data.text: I researched the best spot to take my parents out and chose the Whitehorse.  It was 6 pm we got our drinks promptly ordered the appetizers and then it went down hill I had to complain about the service.   The bartender took over and service was restored.   The food  was delicious.   It would have been 5 stars.   White Horse when there is a convention in town staff accordingly.

data.title: Great service, amazing food !
data.text: Went to the White horse in St. Cloud Minnesota for a late lunch today. Both the clubhouse sandwich and house salad were amazing! Our server Holly, was quite attentive, friendly, and able to take orders without jotting down specific requests. Would highly recommend trying their summertime founders mango habanero beer as well!

data.title: Fantastic Food!
data.text: My husband and I love to share the Fish and Chips.  The panco-crusted walleye is perfectly done and the soups are usually a wonderful surprise.

data.title: Good bar
data.text: Although I haven't eaten here yet, the bar is decent. The bartenders are friendly and they have a good selection of craft beers on tap. There is a small outdoor space as well.

data.title: Not your typical bar
data.text: We tend to go here mostly for lunch.  The menu is the same whenever you go day or night.  Good sandwiches, good salads.  The almond crusted walleye is excellent.  Big enough to take home 1/2 of it. A good beer and wine selection.  Just a funky little place.  Wait staff is very attentive.  Sometimes the service can be a little slow when they are really busy before a show at the theater nearby.  But that's OK.  Worth the wait.

data.title: Fabulous Food!!
data.text: White Horse has a wonderful menu. Sometimes a bit of a wait for a table, but definitely worth that wait!

data.title: wow
data.text: Our book club went to the White Horse for a special night out. No one was disappointed with the food. All excellent and different from the normal St Cloud fare. Everyone I talk to who has eaten here raves about the food.

data.title: almond encrusted walleye
data.text: This is one of those iconic old fashioned saloon - type bars with excellent food and friendly knowledgeable bartenders.  The old high metal ceilings make it get a little loud when it's full, but as long as I'm in good company it can be overlooked for the chance to get some of their almond encrusted walleye.  Dang!  I keep going back...it's always as good as the last time!!   Very nice location too - right next to the Paramount Theater....dinner and a show, how can you lose?

data.title: Great bar!  Even better lunch place!
data.text: Not your typical bar food on this menu.  Everything I have had here has been awesome!  My latest lunch was the pumpkin spice ravioli (made from scratch) and it was phenomenal!!  The White Horse has a great ambiance - especially being a downtown bar in a college town - it is so not a college bar.  Service has always been great!  Just love this place!!!

data.title: Excellent Food in Historic Venue
data.text: The White Horse has a completely different menu for lunch than for dinner. Just be aware of that. Both are excellent, and I've never had a bad meal here. The dinner menu features quite an international selection, and I can't speak to that as well. Lunch is pretty standard fare... burgers, sandwiches, soup, etc. I've had their reuben, turkey club, and cheese sandwich. All were great, and served with waffle fries. If you go here before or after an event at the Paramount Theater, expect a wait. The place gets busy. You'll like the historic venue, with the old bar, the tin ceiling, and the art on the walls. It's a great place for a date or just hanging out with friends.

data.title: Great food, service...eh.
data.text: Interesting and tasty food with a rotating beer selection.  It is a nice small bar/restaurant downtown so parking can be a challenge.  I have been a few times and the staff are not very friendly and rather standoffish.

data.title: Extremely Tasty
data.text: Title says it all...........along with great service this is a great place to spend for dinner or just drinks.

data.title: Good Upscale Burger Spot
data.text: We had a good time going here. They had good burgers and good beer. The service was quick and the wait staff was all very nice.

data.title: Order the Spicy Thai Burger!!
data.text: Order the "Spicy Thai Burger" --- wow -- All burgers are a blend of top meats (short rib, chuck, brisket), and this particular burger is one of the most original I've ever had.  Also love that they serve Surly Brewing Co on tap to complement the Minnesota experience. Bravo! Only reason not a "5" is that waffle fries came out like warm, but they immediately re-served fresh ones!

data.title: Unusually good food for a bar
data.text: The first time I went here was a year ago with a large group of college students, and we were served a variety of great food. Today my son and I had the Thai Steak Salad. The serving was generous, and the sirloin steak was done to our liking and was of really good quality. The dressing was tangy! Service was good.

data.title: Decent food isn't worth the arrogance
data.text: Food was decent, maybe even a bit better than that, but the arrogance of the owner/bartender pushed me past the point of ever wanting to return.

data.title: Just ok
data.text:
A little inconsistent food wise . Great beer selection. Love the free popcorn and peanuts. 
Good variety on the menu. Service can be challenging sometimes!
